name: Vista Outdoors, Inc.
description: Vista Outdoors, Inc. is a leading outdoor sports and recreation company that specializes in the manufacturing and marketing of a diverse range of products for outdoor enthusiasts. Established in 2015, Vista Outdoors has grown through a series of acquisitions, integrating numerous well-known brands under its umbrella, such as Federal Ammunition, Bushnell, and CamelBak. The company's portfolio spans several categories, including shooting sports, hunting, fishing, camping, and outdoor lifestyle. Vista Outdoors emphasizes innovation and quality, consistently developing products that enhance the outdoor experience while also prioritizing sustainability and environmental stewardship. With a commitment to serving outdoor enthusiasts and fostering a love for the outdoors, Vista Outdoors aims to inspire and equip its customers for their adventures. The company operates across various channels, including retail, e-commerce, and direct-to-consumer sales, making its products widely accessible. Vista Outdoors focuses on building strong brand loyalty and community engagement, contributing to the growth of outdoor activities and interests worldwide.
